description: This dataset contains health and healthcare variables gathered from the American Community Survey (ACS) from 2019 to 2022. It includes data related to health insurance, social security and disability.
source: American Community Survey 5-year data - U.S. Census Bureau

variables.name: social_security_p
variables.description: Percent of total households with social security
variables.units: Percent out of total households in geography

variables.name: with_health_insurance_p
variables.description: Percentage of civilian nonnstitutionalized with health insurance coverage

variables.name: public_insurance_p
variables.description: Percentage of civilian nonnstitutionalized with public coverage
variables.units: Percent out of total households in geography

variables.name: disability_p
variables.description: Percentage of civilian nonnstitutionalized with a disability

notes: GEOIDs correspond to Census tracts for the given year of the dataset. Note that Census tract boundaries have changed after the 2020 decennial census, which may affect geographic consistency over time.
